fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Education and training, Youth, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Our organization follows various EU initiatives in culture and education. Creative Europe, is among the programs we are most interested in.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
EUNIC-European Union National Institutes for Culture

http://www.eunic-online.eu/
relevant_communication:
The Yunus Emre Institute as per its counterparts in Brussels, brings together various cultural groups organising concerts, movie screenings, debate and poetry and other literature recitals. 
These activities continue all year round bringing together both national and international communities in Brussels.  
The Yunus Emre Institute is also very active at EUNIC-European Union National Institutes for Culture as a associate member.
goals__remit: Yunus Emre Institute represents Turkish culture, language and arts on a Global scale. Its aim is to establish new channels, enhance cooperation and foster cultural transaction of cultural activities between Turkey and the rest of the World.  Yunus Emre considers arts, sports, literature, music, science, business & economy and beyond as the main components of cultural diplomacy and indeed these are among the most important pillars of sustainable and harmonious relations among different societies.
